Lde/ecspride/ApplicationLifecyle2;->onCr: Stores device ID (IMEI) in a field, which may be accessed by onLowMemory(). No data leak detected.
Lde/ecspride/ApplicationLifecyle2;->onLo: The onLowMemory() method sends the IMEI (stored in a field) via SMS, which constitutes a data leak as it transmits sensitive device information without user consent.
